incorrect_beacon_detection.max_position_intolerance_hint: Maximal allowed difference of estimated beacon position and original beacon position in proximity database. The beacon is added to ignore list if the difference is more then this value
incorrect_beacon_detection.min_cells_number_hint: Minimal number of cells for beacon position assessment
incorrect_beacon_detection.max_cells_number_hint: Maximal number of cells for beacon position assessment
incorrect_beacon_detection.RSSI_cutoff_threshold_hint: RSSI cutoff threshold (< 0) relative to beacon Tx power for using proximity BFP data in assessment
incorrect_beacon_detection.min_bfp_cell_weight_hint: Minimal weight of non-empty mode of proximity BFP cell for using proximity BFP data in assessment
